metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6974 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel before 4.20.8, kvm_ioctl_create_device invirt/kvm/kvm_main.c mishandles reference counting because of a racecondition, leading to a use-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6974` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-145-generic - 4.4.0-145.171
